required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Travoprost New Formulations in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Safety and IOP-Lowering Efficacy of Three Alternative Travoprost Formulations to Vehicle and TRAVATAN速 in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to describe the safety and IOP-lowering efficacy of Travoprost New Formulations compared to TRAVATAN速 and to vehicle in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in intraocular pressure (IOP)
primary_outcome.description: IOP (fluid pressure inside the eye) was measured by Goldmann applanation tonometry. A higher IOP can be a greater risk for developing glaucoma or glaucoma progression (leading to optic nerve damage). A more negative change indicates a greater amount of improvement.

secondary_outcome.description: IOP (fluid pressure inside the eye) was measured by Goldmann applanation tonometry. A higher IOP can be a greater risk for developing glaucoma or glaucoma progression (leading to optic nerve damage).

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean percent change from baseline in IOP
secondary_outcome.description: IOP (fluid pressure inside the eye) was measured by Goldmann applanation tonometry. A higher IOP can be a greater risk for developing glaucoma or glaucoma progression (leading to optic nerve damage). A more negative percent change indicates a greater amount of improvement.

arm_group.description: Travoprost ophthalmic solution (new formulation), 1 of 3 dose levels, 1 drop in the study eye(s) once daily, at 8 PM, for 4 weeks
Travoprost ophthalmic solution 0.004%, 1 drop in the study eye(s) once daily, at 8 PM, for 4 weeks
Inactive ingredients, 1 drop in the study eye(s) once daily, at 8 PM, for 4 weeks

intervention.description: Inactive ingredients used as a placebo
